meaning: Of or having to do with an uncle.
Regarded as characteristic of an uncle, especially in benevolence or tolerance.
Having traits considered typical of uncles; jolly, indulgent, stodgy, etc.
In the manner of an uncle, pertaining to an uncle.
sentences: For many young men, an avuncular man serves as a role model.
Tim was so excited to have an avuncular relationship with his new nephew.
The man living next door tries to be avuncular to all of the neighborhood children.
When things went well he grew expansive, his tone avuncular.
